import React from 'react'; const Header = (props) => { return(
{props.title}
  • Products
  • Offers
  • Help
    • {props.user.userId!=null?(
    • {props.user.email===null?(Sign In):''} Profile Orders Favourites {props.user.email!==null?():''}
    • ):''}
  • Cart {props.count.length}
) } export default Header;
